Pre-Game Insights: Netherlands won the toss and opted to bat.
Both teams had their playing XIs confirmed before the match.
Post-Match Reflections: Netherlands moved to the eighth spot in the points table after their win.
Bangladesh slipped to ninth after the loss.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the revamped Eden Gardens in Kolkata.
The highest individual score for Netherlands was 68 by Scott Edwards.
The highest individual score for Bangladesh was 35 by Mehidy Hasan Miraz.
Others: The match was live-streamed on Disney+ Hotstar and broadcast on Star Sports Network.
